Title: Authorizes the adoption of a rule permitting the use of the Korean war veterans parkway in Richmond county by certain commercial vehicles
Summary: Authorizes the New York city department of transportation to adopt a rule permitting the use of the Korean war veterans parkway in Richmond county by single unit commercial vehicles having no more than three axles and ten tires.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to the creation of an exception on the Korean war veterans parkway in Richmond county for the use of certain commercial vehicles
